briefTitle: ACTIVPROSEIN : Professional Activity After Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Psycho Social Factors Associated to Return to Work After Breast Cancer Care : a Prognostic Study
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Return to Work
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To identify the impact of psycho social factors on delay of return to any modality of work, until 24 months after localized breast cancer care, in Grenoble University Hospital (Michalon and Voiron included)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient between 18 and 60 years old
* Histologically proven localized breast cancer, of any subtype
* Cared in Grenoble University Hospital between 2015 and 2019
* Working at the time of diagnosis

Exclusion Criteria:

* Retired at the end of adjuvant therapy
* Deprived of liberty, under juridical protection, not able to give consent
* Psychiatric conditions or addictive behavior interfering with questionary filling
